import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { addToCart } from '../features/cart'; import { dispatchDOMEvent } from '@testing-library/user-event/dist/types/event'; function Product() { const { id } = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const getProduct = async () => { setLoading(true); const response = await fetch(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${id}`); const data = await response.json(); setProduct(data); setLoading(false); } getProduct(); }, [id]); const Loading = () => { return ( <>

) } const ShowDetails = () => { return ( <>
 Back
in {product.category}
{product.title}
Rating {product.rating && product.rating.rate}
${product.price}

{product.description}

{/* */}
) } return ( <>
{loading ? : }
) } export default Product
